name: 2021 12th International Conference on Mechanical and Electrical Technologies（ICMET 2021）
content: Publication-Special Issue-IJMERR(ISSN: 2278-0149) International Journal of Mechanical Engineering and Robotics Research is a scholarly peer-reviewed international scientific journal published bimonthly, focusing on theories, systems, methods, algorithms and applications in mechanical engineering and robotics. The journal will be indexed in Scopus (since 2016), CNKI, Google Scholar, Crossref, etc..
